document_data.name: Thrakkus
document_data.mainbody: '''Thrakkus''' was a red [[dragonborn]] butcher in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Thrakkus came off as stern and serious, not taking kindly to those whom he saw as "fools" or those that wasted his time.
document_data.Abilities: Thrakkus, being a red dragonborn, could breath a cone of fire up to {{SI|15|feet|long=yes}} and was resistant to fire.
document_data.Activities: Thrakkus worked as a butcher in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]], having converted a burned-down windmill into his butcher shop. However, his true activities involved butchering humanoid corpses delivered to him by the [[Zhentarim]] for disposal, and selling the meat.
document_data.Relationships: The dragonborn allowed squatters to reside in his home and business, provided they helped in other tasks or are not disruptive.
